title: Sample Book Of Ribbons, ca. 1910
description: Notebook with dark leather corners and back, with board covers covered with polychrome marbled paper, and plain pages on which are pasted 94 wide ribbon samples in polychrome and white silk, and one section of coarse cotton cloth printed with roses. Samples include chine, satin stripes, satin printed, fancy cloth, ribbed cloth, printed cotton.

tombstone.epitaph: Sample Book Of Ribbons, ca. 1910.Medium: silk, cotton, leather, paper. Gift of Augusta Dillon. 1949-82-2.
